dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.sales.segment.MarketSegment
dataStructure.description:
A grouping of Parties, GeographicAreas, SalesChannels, and so forth. MarketSegments are the target of MarketingCampaigns, ProductOfferings, ProductPromotions, ProductPlacements, and ProductPrograms from both internal and external (Competitors, and other Providers) perspective.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: MarketSegment

child.name: iD
child.description:
A unique identifier for the MarketSegment.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: iD

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains what the MarketSegment is.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: marketSegmentSubCategory
child.description:
A further classification of MarketSegments because they share common characteristics. For example, a vertical category MarketSegment may be further categorized as consumer, business, or carrier.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: marketSegmentSubCategory

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period during which the MarketSegment is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: marketSegmentCategory
child.description:
A classification of MarketSegments because they share common characteristics. For example a vertical or horizontal MarketSegment. Vertical MarketSegments put a PartyRole in a single segment, while a PartyRole can exist in multiple horizontal MarketSegments

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: marketSegmentCategory

child.name: name
child.description:
A word, term, or phrase by which a MarketSegment is known and distinguished from other MarketSegments.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: partyDemographic
